name: Mark as Unread channel remains unread when receiving new message

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Mark as Unread channel remains unread when receiving new message
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Open Mattermost on two different devices or browsers as two different users
  2. User1 mark a channel as unread
  3. User2 post a message in that same channel
inline.expectedResult: 3. The channel is not marked as read for User1 on the first device / browser unless you switch away from the channel

customFields.Related ticket(s): Receiving a message marks the channel as read, even if it was previously marked as unread — MM-19493
